content.p: If you have a health, welfare or behaviour concern about a current University of Nottingham Student who is studying Pharmacy, please complete the “Concern Form”, sign it and then post the completed form to “Fitness to Practise Administrator”, c/o Pharmacy Administrator, Faculty of Science Office, The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus, Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih, Selangor, Malaysia or by email to pharmacy.concerns@nottingham.ac.uk. If you have a concern about a student, please do not delay submitting your concern if you aren’t able to send a physically signed version. Scanned or high quality photographs of completed forms will also be accepted. All concern forms received will be treated as confidential but it cannot be guaranteed that the originator will not be identified to the student concerned. Where a concern about an individual is progressed to a fitness to practise enquiry, only in exceptional circumstances will their identity not be disclosed. Concerns raised anonymously will not normally be considered. Concern Form (Word Document) Concern Form (PDF Document) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
